item.title: 瑞银首席执行官称更好的预警有助于提高银行业的安全性
item.description: 瑞士联合银行 瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）周三敦促有关部门提高发现银行问题的能力，同时他还试图就瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）于 2023 年倒闭后瑞士银行业的整顿工作寻求共识。【原文：UBS CEO Sergio Ermotti on Wednesday urged authorities to improve their ability to detect problems at banks as he sought to find common ground over efforts to overhaul the Swiss banking sector following the 2023 demise of Credit Suisse.】

item.title: 亚马逊在与卢森堡创纪录的 8.12 亿美元隐私罚款的法庭斗争中败诉
item.description: 根据卢森堡隐私监管机构网站上的一份声明，四年前，该机构曾对亚马逊处以创纪录的 7.46 亿欧元（约合 8.124 亿美元）罚款。【原文：Amazon lost its fight against a record 746 million euro ($812.4 million) fine handed out by Luxembourg's privacy regulator four years ago as a court sided with the watchdog, according to a statement on the regulator's website.】

item.title: 消息人士称，赛峰集团提出出售北美部门，以赢得欧盟对柯林斯公司交易的许可
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的人士周三表示，法国发动机和飞机设备制造商赛峰集团已提出出售其在北美的一项业务，作为一种补救措施，以消除欧盟对其18亿美元竞购柯林斯宇航公司飞行控制业务的担忧。【原文：French engine and aircraft equipment maker Safran has offered the sale of a business in North America which it agreed in December, as a remedy to address EU concerns about its $1.8 billion bid for Collins Aerospace's flight controls business, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 即时观点：美联储维持利率不变，4 月放缓量化宽松步伐
item.description: 美联储周三如期维持利率稳定，但美国央行决策者表示，在经济增长放缓、最终导致通胀下滑的背景下，他们仍预计在今年年底前将借贷成本降低半个百分点。【原文：The Federal Reserve held interest rates steady on Wednesday, as expected, but U.S. central bank policymakers indicated they still anticipate reducing borrowing costs by half a percentage point by the end of this year in the context of slowing economic growth and, eventually, a downturn in inflation.】

item.title: JBS 谋求两地股票上市给 BNDES 带来困境
item.description: 巴西肉类加工企业 JBS 谋求在美国上市的决定使其第二大股东--国家开发银行（BNDES）的投资部门成为关注焦点，该公司的举动是否与该银行促进巴西企业发展的核心使命相冲突。【原文：Brazilian meat processor JBS' decision to pursue a U.S. listing has shone a spotlight on its No. 2 shareholder, National Development Bank's (BNDES) investment arm, and whether the company's move clashed with the bank's core mission of fostering Brazilian corporate development.】

item.title: 美联储决策者预计今年降息两次，部分人认为会更少
item.description: 美国央行行长们周三表示，他们很可能在今年晚些时候降息两个季度，与三个月前的预测中值相同，尽管他们预测经济增长放缓、通胀率上升。【原文：U.S. central bankers on Wednesday signaled they are likely to deliver two quarter-point interest-rate cuts later this year, the same median forecast as three months ago, even as they forecast slower economic growth and higher inflation.】

item.title: 美联储表示将放缓资产负债表的清算进程
item.description: 美联储周三表示，由于在取消政府借贷限额问题上持续陷入僵局，美联储在评估市场流动性方面面临挑战，因此美联储将降低其仍然庞大的资产负债表的缩减速度。【原文：The Federal Reserve said on Wednesday that it will reduce the pace of the drawdown of its still-massive balance sheet, as it faces challenges in assessing market liquidity during an ongoing impasse over lifting the government’s borrowing limit.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Brookfield 在收购 Colonial 管道公司的竞争中处于领先地位
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）正在成为收购殖民管道公司（Colonial Pipeline）的领跑者，包括债务在内，这笔交易对该管道运营商的估值可能达到或超过 100 亿美元。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management is emerging as the frontrunner to acquire Colonial Pipeline, in a deal that could value the pipeline operator at $10 billion or more including debt, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Synopsys 为人工智能 "代理 "设计计算机芯片制定战略
item.description: 生产半导体设计软件的 Synopsys 公司周三推出了一项技术，该公司称这项技术将为计算机取代许多新计算机芯片的制造工作铺平道路。【原文：Synopsys , which makes software used to design semiconductors, on Wednesday introduced a technology it said will pave the way toward computers taking over many of the tasks in creating new computer chips.】

item.title: Synopsys 为人工智能 "代理 "设计计算机芯片制定战略
item.description: 生产半导体设计软件的 Synopsys 公司周三推出了一项技术，该公司称这项技术将为计算机取代许多新计算机芯片的制造工作铺平道路。【原文：Synopsys , which makes software used to design semiconductors, on Wednesday introduced a technology it said will pave the way toward computers taking over many of the tasks in creating new computer chips.】

item.title: 报告显示，受流媒体订阅的推动，2024 年音乐收入将再次上升
item.description: 一个行业组织周三表示，2024 年，订阅流媒体连续第十年推动全球录制音乐收入增长 4.8%，达到 296 亿美元，同时敦促政策制定者保护艺术家免受人工智能开发者的版权威胁。【原文：Subscription streaming boosted global recorded music revenues for a tenth straight year in 2024, by 4.8% to $29.6 billion, an industry group said on Wednesday, while urging policymakers to protect artists from copyright threats by artificial intelligence developers.】

item.title: 摩根大通称俄罗斯 2027 年后才可能重新加入 MSCI 全球指数
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan）分析师在一份客户报告中写道，俄罗斯股市可能需要更多时间才能重新进入广受关注的摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）全球股票指数，而最乐观的情况是从6月起的两年内。【原文：Russian stocks are likely to need more time to reenter the widely followed MSCI global equity indexes that the most optimistic scenario of two years from June, JPMorgan analysts wrote in a client note.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称 360 万台 Blackwell GPU 订单不包括 Meta
item.description: Nvidia 首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）周三表示，前四大云服务提供商已订购了多达 360 万台 Nvidia 旗舰产品 "Blackwell "图形处理器，其中不包括 Meta Platforms 的订单。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said on Wednesday that the top four cloud service providers have ordered as many as 3.6 million of its flagship "Blackwell" graphics processors, and that the figure did not include orders from Meta Platforms .】

item.title: 受在线赌场和体育博彩的推动，希腊 OPAP 在 2024 年创下收入纪录
item.description: 希腊最大的博彩公司 OPAP 周三公布了其有史以来最高的年度博彩总收入，这主要得益于在线赌场游戏和体育博彩的强劲表现。【原文：Greece's biggest gaming firm OPAP on Wednesday reported its highest ever annual gross gaming revenue driven by the strong performance of online casino games and sports betting.】

item.title: 爱尔兰总理表示，欧盟需要时间应对特朗普的互惠关税措施
item.description: 爱尔兰总理迈克尔-马丁（Micheal Martin）周三表示，欧盟在对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划于4月2日提出的新互惠税率做出回应之前还需要 "一点时间"。【原文：The European Union will take "a bit of time" before it responds to the new reciprocal tariff rates U.S. President Donald Trump plans to outline on April 2, Irish Prime Minister Micheal Martin said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，汇丰银行正在洽谈将德国基金管理部门出售给 BlackFin
item.description: 彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道称，汇丰控股正就向私募股权公司 BlackFin Capital Partners 出售其德国基金管理业务进行深入谈判。【原文：HSBC Holdings is in advanced talks to sell its German fund administration business to private-equity firm BlackFin Capital Partners, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 现代、起亚防盗措施助推美国汽车盗窃案急剧下降
item.description: 由于汽车制造商（主要是现代和起亚）加强了防盗措施，同时供应链限制的缓解也使偷车换零件变得不那么有利可图，美国的汽车盗窃案创下了四十年来的最大年度降幅。【原文：Vehicle thefts in the United States recorded their biggest yearly drop in four decades as automakers, mainly Hyundai and Kia, bolstered anti-theft measures, while easing supply chain constraints made stealing vehicles for parts less lucrative.】

item.title: 意大利寻求欧盟对美国关税的回应，旨在防止贸易战
item.description: 意大利工业部长阿道夫-乌索（Adolfo Urso）周三表示，意大利将要求欧盟为可能受到美国关税影响的行业准备补偿措施，并补充说他希望避免贸易战。【原文：Italy will ask the European Union to prepare compensatory measures for sectors that could be impacted by U.S tariffs, Industry Minister Adolfo Urso said on Wednesday, adding that he wanted to avoid a trade war.】

item.title: 沙特阿美石油公司支持的 Cognite 公司在人工智能领域的扩张押注印度
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）支持的工业软件公司 Cognite 周三在印度南部城市班加罗尔开设了人工智能服务中心，并表示正在探索与印度顶级企业集团签订合同的可能性。【原文：Saudi Aramco-backed industrial software firm Cognite on Wednesday opened its AI services center in the southern Indian city of Bengaluru and said it was exploring potential contracts with top conglomerates in the country.】

item.title: 特朗普能源部批准 Venture Global 从路易斯安那州出口液化天然气项目
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）领导的政府周三批准 Venture Global LNG 从路易斯安那州拟建的设施出口天然气。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration granted Venture Global LNG approval on Wednesday to export natural gas from a proposed Louisiana facility which had faced delays under former President Joe Biden.】

item.title: 特朗普能源部批准 Venture Global 从路易斯安那州出口液化天然气项目
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）领导的政府周三批准 Venture Global LNG 从路易斯安那州拟建的设施出口天然气。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration granted Venture Global LNG approval on Wednesday to export natural gas from a proposed Louisiana facility which had faced delays under former President Joe Biden.】

item.title: 德意志银行计划在 2025 年 "大幅 "削减分行并减少 2000 名员工
item.description: 德意志银行首席执行官克里斯蒂安-斯温（Christian Sewing）周三表示，德意志银行将在今年 "大幅 "削减分支机构，并在 2025 年将零售银行的员工人数减少约 2000 人。【原文：Deutsche Bank will reduce branches by a "signficant" number this year and trim headcount of the retail bank by around 2,000 people in 2025, Chief Executive Officer Christian Sewing said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国原油库存增加，汽油和馏分油库存下降 - EIA
item.description: 美国能源信息署周三表示，上周美国原油库存增幅超过预期，而汽油和馏分油库存则有所下降。【原文：U.S. crude stocks rose more than expected, while gasoline and distillate inventories fell last week, the Energy Information Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧洲钢铁制造商就欧盟钢铁行动计划发表看法
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三宣布了一项行动计划，旨在提高欧洲萎靡不振的钢铁行业的竞争力，使其免受美国对进口钢铁和铝征收关税的影响。【原文：The European Commission announced on Wednesday an action plan to make Europe's ailing steel sector more competitive and to shield it from the impact of U.S. tariffs on imports of steel and aluminium, prompting reactions from major industrial actors, analysts, and think tanks.】

item.title: 根据具有里程碑意义的欧盟规则，谷歌被控两项罪名，面临罚款风险
item.description: 随着反垄断监管机构继续打击大型科技公司，Alphabet 旗下公司谷歌周三被指控违反了两项具有里程碑意义的欧盟规则。【原文：Alphabet unit Google was hit with two charges of breaching landmark EU rules on Wednesday, as antitrust regulators continued their crackdown against Big Tech.】

item.title: 苹果公司被欧盟反垄断监管机构勒令向竞争对手开放
item.description: 苹果公司周三被欧盟反垄断监管机构勒令向竞争对手开放其封闭的生态系统，后者详细说明了如何按照该集团具有里程碑意义的规则进行开放，以及不遵守规则可能导致的调查和罚款。【原文：Apple was ordered by EU antitrust regulators on Wednesday to open up its closed ecosystem to rivals, with the latter spelling out details on how to go about it in line with the bloc's landmark rules and where non-compliance could lead to an investigation and fines.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯首席执行官称，无法保证投资 33 亿美元的绿色钢铁厂的经济性
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯集团首席执行官表示，除非德国确保有足够的绿色氢气供应，否则蒂森克虏伯计划在杜伊斯堡建造的一个碳中性钢厂可能会搁浅。【原文：A planned 3-billion-euro ($3.3 billion) site Thyssenkrupp is building in Duisburg to make carbon-neutral steel could be stranded unless Germany ensures there's sufficient green hydrogen to supply it, the conglomerate's CEO said.】

item.title: 半导体企业呼吁制定《欧盟芯片法 2.0
item.description: 计算机芯片制造商和半导体供应链公司周三呼吁欧盟委员会推出一项新的支持计划，作为《2023 芯片法案》的后续行动，此次除生产外，还将重点关注芯片设计、材料和设备。【原文：Computer chip makers and semiconductor supply chain firms on Wednesday called on the European Commission to launch a new support program as a follow up to the 2023 Chips Act, this time focusing on chip design, materials and equipment, in addition to manufacturing.】

item.title: 瑞波币首席执行官称美国证券交易委员会将撤销对加密货币公司的上诉
item.description: 加密货币公司瑞波实验室首席执行官布拉德-加林豪斯（Brad Garlinghouse）在社交媒体平台 X 上发文称，美国证券交易委员会将放弃对瑞波实验室的上诉。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission will drop its appeal against Ripple Labs, the crypto firm's CEO Brad Garlinghouse said in a post on social media platform X.】

item.title: 波音首席财务官对关税影响零部件供应表示担忧
item.description: 波音公司首席财务官布赖恩-韦斯特（Brian West）周三表示，公司担心唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税措施会影响供应商的零部件供应。【原文：Boeing CFO Brian West said on Wednesday the company is concerned about the impact of President Donald Trump's tariffs on the availability of parts from its suppliers.】
